document.full_text: lindsay lohan was briefly jailed again on friday after a rollercoaster day in which a judge downgraded her jewelry theft charge, but sentenced the actress to four months behind bars for violating her probation.
document.title: lindsay lohan out of jail after rollercoaster day
lines_and_colors: lindsay lohan was briefly jailed again on friday after a rollercoaster day in which a judge downgraded her jewelry theft charge, but sentenced the actress to four months behind bars for violating her probation.
